channel.title: Writer and the welfare state
channel.description:
A group of writers from various parts of the world gather in Copenhagen to discuss the place of the writer in modern society.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Writers debate culture and politics
item.description: Writers like Frank O'Connor, James Baldwin, Iris Murdoch, and others speak on writing, culture, and politics.
item.dc:creator: Sveriges radio aktiebolag
item.dc:subject: Writing
